speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Yeah? What the hell do you want?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Credit. Before we proceed, can you please confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the f*** would I tell you anything? Screw you!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand this might be frustrating, but I need to verify your identity. Can you confirm your address?

speaker: Customer
text: Why don't you shove that up your ass? I’m not giving you anything!

speaker: Agent
text: I assure you, I’m just trying to help you. I can’t provide account details without verification.

speaker: Customer
text: Help? You think this is help? You're just another annoying leech!

speaker: Agent
text: I’m here to assist you, and I’d like to resolve this matter. Just a little information is needed.

speaker: Customer
text: Oh, give me a break! You think I owe you something, right?

speaker: Agent
text: I can provide details once we verify your information. Can you confirm your zip code?

speaker: Customer
text: You’re really pissing me off with this shit! Fine, it’s 12345!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. I see you have a balance of $500. How would you like to proceed?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m not paying a damn thing today!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. Would you like to set up a payment plan instead?
